info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Evalute a number of statistics on bit_sequences of a bit array.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output measure type : Ophidia typing. Supported types are: 'oph_double'; 'oph_float'; 'oph_long'; 'oph_int'; 'oph_short'; 'oph_byte'. - measure : input measure. - mask : possible values are -- 0000 : invalid -- 1xxx : number of bit sequences -- x1xx : mean size of bit sequence -- xx1x : maximum size of bit sequence -- xxx1 : maximum size of bit sequence - value : value of bit composing the sequence, 0 or 1 (default).
[Return type] Binary-array.
[Examples] Count the number of bit sequences. oph_bit_sequence('','OPH_LONG',measure,'1')
